name: White Negroni
description: The White Negroni has been a trendy drink lately, showing up on cocktail menus across the country.
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 ounce gin (recommended: a London dry like Beefeater)
1/2 ounce Cocchi Americano (sub Bonal or Suze if desired)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine gin, Dolin, and Cocchi Americano in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir until well chilled. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Add garnish and serve.
